#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t,n;
    cin>>t;
    
    while(t--)
    {
     cin>>n;
     int p=n,sum=0;
     long int ans;
     
     while(p!=0)
     {
       sum=sum+p%10;
       p=p/10;
     }
     
     ans=n*pow(2,sum);
     cout<<ans<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
